q: LONDON( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron began looking for a new media chief Saturday to replace Andy Coulson after he quit over a tabloid phone-hacking row, in a test for the nine-month-old government. So far, our worst day in government, a senior David Cameron aide told The GuardIan Edmondson after Andy Coulson quit Friday, bowing to pressure over what he knew about hacking at the News of the World( NOTW) when he was its editor. Computers can intuit for people: Google chief London: In 50 years, computers will be able to intuit for people, Eric Schmidt , the chief of internet search engine giant Google, predicts. There will be a ubiquitous computational capability so amazing that people will assume that it is an assistant. It knows who you are, it knows what you do, it makes suggestions, it intuits things for you, Eric Schmidt told British daily the Telegraph. View result Eric Schmidt said that people who`` opt in'' to the system will begin experiencing a much richer relationship with technology, aided by their computerised`` personal assistant

''. As Google's new chief executive, Larry Page will lead product development and technology strategy, along with all day-to-day operations of the firm. Sergey Brin , who co-founded Google with Larry Page , will devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products . His title will remain co-founder. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said that he had been working with Larry Page and Sergey Brin on ways to simplify Google's management structure and quicken decision making.
